reviewText:
A good case of simple to learn hard to master. This is a simplistic match 3 time waster, with a nice twist. The level challenges are a good way to keep things interesting and add more difficulty, and gravity shifting mechanic means your lovely stratigy to get that nice big combo can be screwed up, or even made avaliable by those fun little blocks.

Nice varity in game types, and unlike any match three you'll find on facebook, you're never halted from that one more turn" you want.

I reccomend this to anyone who'se looking for something simple yet challenging."
voteText: 11 of 14 people (79%) found this review helpful

reviewText: Steam definetly needs Full mouse and keyboard support" tag.\n\nThe first issue i've came upon was main menu. I wasn't able to switch the selected item. You have to imitate tap and slide with mouse. Then ingame i wasn't able to just quit to main menu by hitting escape! WTF
date: why the hell i'm supposed to just randomly hit all the buttons to figure that out? Also whole lot of buttons do nothing when you try to click them and you're forced press "enter" or "whitespace". The damn interface is just a mess. I will not mention that it replaced all buttons with controller notations that i wasn't using.\n\nBackgrounds are damn awful
hoursPlayed:
they are so low res it hurts.

Also game doesn't bother explaning it's base gameplay mechanics. Why the hell i had to wait 10 minutes for the first bomb to complete level objectives? You need some kind of tutorial that explains that you can accelerate time and get multipliers by changing gravity without destroying any blocks.

The game itself is not that bad
helpfulPercent: but all of the above leaves me no options but to negative vote it."
commentsCount: 4 of 4 people (100%) found this review helpful

reviewText:
First, let me point out that the game is a simple match 3+ game with objectives to complete the level.  If you like that kind of game I would still recommend not playing this game.

1. The controls are not easy.  You don't know what buttons to push initially without randomally hitting buttons (this is for keyboard and mouse)

2. There are no tutorials to speak of, so you are muddling through the game half blind.

3.  If you want to change the keyboard controls, the naming scheme is hard to understand with the tags in the game (what is the A" button)

Because of these issues
date: I cannot recommend this game.  If those were fixed then I will review the game again and make my decision at that time."

reviewText: A good idea, poorly executed. Weak controls, bad art and UI. This game could and should be good. It just needs a complete presentation overhaul.

reviewText:
A entertaining experience.

The inclusion of a manual is great thing. It explains in detail how the controls are setup and what each diffent mode is and how they play. For a match 3 puzle game it is one of the best I have played and for $3.99 I cant argue with the price. Zen mode is truly like crack.

Manual Below
http://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/403300/manuals/GravBlocks_Manual.pdf?t=1450275074

Pros
- Lots of gameplay modes
- Many control options
- Plenty of achievments

Cons
- Graphics could be better
- Mouse controls on menus can be a bit finicky
